channel.title: thermal imaging on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in thermal imaging on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
FLIR Systems Logo Teledyne FLIR LLC, a subsidiary of Teledyne Technologies, specializes in the design and production of thermal imaging cameras and sensors. Its main customers are governments and in 2020, approximately 31% of its revenues were from the federal government of the United States and its agencies. Source
You can download theFLIRlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: FLIR
item.description: Teledyne FLIR LLC, a subsidiary of Teledyne Technologies, specializes in the design and production of thermal imaging cameras and sensors.
